short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cybersecurity Threat Intelligence Tool - Your plugin for rapid, in-depth threat intelligence search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cyberseeker - Your Ultimate Cybersecurity Threat Intelligence Tool

Uncover the digital threats lurking in the cyber landscape with Cyberseeker! Whether you're a cybersecurity professional, a threat researcher, or simply passionate about online safety, Cyberseeker is your go-to Chrome plugin for swiftly finding critical information related to cybersecurity.

Key Features:
🕵️‍♂️ Comprehensive Threat Research: Seamlessly search for the latest information on threats, vulnerabilities, and attack tactics.
🔍 Indicators of Compromise (IOC): Discover and analyze IOCs, helping you detect and respond to potential breaches.
🛡️ Cybersecurity News & Insights: Stay updated with real-time news, reports, and analysis from trusted cybersecurity sources.
📚 Curated Threat Intelligence: Access curated threat intelligence feeds, reports, and blogs to stay one step ahead of cyber adversaries.
